column5: has anyone fished this camp? they use 6 lakes, I need any info I can get.owner says large walleye common and lots of numbers.need info quick thanks

I don't go to cobblestone but I go to flayer's lodge, they fish about 10 lakes, you have to drive to them, but there is a lake for every spieces of fish,one for lakers,one for smallies etc.We are never dissapointed.The logging roads do get a bit rough sometimes.I don't know what lakes they fish, there are many to fish at. Hope this helps Terry
thanks, i guess i will pass on all the driving
